text: @TimMurtaugh @Shem_Infinite Yeah, that had nothing to do with it. The issue wasn’t with tickets, it was the lack of people willing to go. Trump rallies often have overflow crowds outside with people willing to watch/listen outside. People were likely scared off by covid-19 and threats of protest violence.
